extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.

basic.description: An examination of key issues in European politics. Topics will vary from year to year; consult the department homepage.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Topics in European Politics
